Detailed Description

This is the base class for any identifier class It supports interfaces for comparing, sharing and cloning It also implements the output operator to streams and a generic method to retrieve the value of the concrete identifier.

Member Function Documentation

◆ as_value() [1/2]

bool oos::basic_identifier::as_value ( ) const

Cast the value of the concrete identifier to the type T. Throws a logical_error if a cast is not possible.

Template Parameters
TThe type to cast to.
Returns
The casted value. Returns true if identifier should be treated as plain value (default)
True if treated as plain value

◆ share()

virtual basic_identifier* oos::basic_identifier::share ( )
pure virtual

Share the id of the identifier. The underlying concrete id of an identifier is a shared object so it can be shared within more identifiers of the same type

Returns
A new identifier object with the shared id.

Implemented in oos::identifier< std::string >, and oos::identifier< T, typename std::enable_if< std::is_integral< T >::value >::type >.
